{{Wired embedded system |brand=Cloud Engines |model=Pogoplug |revision=v4 A3 |upc=850877002320 |asin=B006I5MKZY |price=99.99 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=common |type=NAS |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6192 |cpu1_cspeed=800 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Hynix |fla1_model=H27U1G8F2BTR |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5PS1G63EFR |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 3.0, SATA, SDHC, |expansion_usb_num=3 |expansion_sata_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 6-pin header,, J17 |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL,, 4-pad header (115200,8,N,1),, J11 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1116R |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=4.5V/18V Synchronous Step-Down Three Buck Switcher;Texas Instruments;TPS65251;;1;,,, 30V, 7A N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDS8984;;1;,,, 5V/12V Synchronous Buck PWM DC/DC Controller;Richtek;RT8105;;1;,,, USB 3.0 / xHCI Host Controller;Fresco Logic;FL1009;;1;,,, 2A Linear Power, Low Dropout Regulator;uPI Semiconductor;uP0105;;1; |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4;Cloud Engines;, |stock_os=Linux;2.6.31.8;KW LSP release 5.1.3;, |tp_firmware=Arch Linux (Arm), OpenWrt, |oui_eth=00:25:31 }} [http://pogoplug.com/devices#pick Product page]
*[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/cloudengines/pogo-v4 ''Pogoplug v4'' on the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki]
[http://archlinuxarm.org/platforms/armv5/pogoplug-series-4 Arch Arm Linux] alternate firmware
''Fresco Logic'' FL1009 PCI Express to USB 3.0 host controller :provides 2x USB 3.0 ports, remaining port is USB 2.0.
